name: Tiny Ice Dungeon
description:
Story

You are a rogue, you've heard some rumors of a mysterious dungeon far in the north where the layout of the room can seemingly rotate out of nowhere. The cold climate hasn't done the place any favors either as the whole floor is covered in ice! Being the scoundrel that you are you figured that this place might house some treasure ripe for the taking. A little danger has never stopped the likes of you.

Summary

Puzzle your way through the rooms of an icy dungeon while using the mysterious power of the dungeon itself to rotate the layout of the room. When rotating only the goal and the player remain in place, be careful not to fall into any pits and make use of dry patches of ground whenever possible.

Controls Action
